verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: self] - [V: described] [ARG1: psychopath] left behind unemotional trail of murder the documents and taped recordings that mark anthony conditt left behind in the wake of his deadly run of serial bombings in texas paint a picture of a remorseless methodical young man who plotted attacks more as a hobby than as acts of crime or hatred published reports show mark anthony conditt murder austin
